member.summary: Adds a matrix A to a vectorb.

The matrix where the result should be stored. Pass the same matrix as one of the arguments to perform the operation in place.

member.summary: Multiplies a matrix A with a vectorb.
member.param: The dimension along which the operation will be carried. If set to 0, then the vector b must have the same dimensions as rows of A, and the operation will be carried at each column vector. If 1, then it must have the same dimensions as columns in A, and the operation will be carried at each row vector.
The matrix where the result should be stored. Pass the same matrix as one of the arguments to perform the operation in place.

member.name: M:Accord.Math.Elementwise.Subtract(System.Decimal[0:,0:],System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Double[0:,0:])
member.summary: Subtracts a matrix A from a vectorb.
member.param: The dimension along which the operation will be carried. If set to 0, then the vector b must have the same dimensions as rows of A, and the operation will be carried at each column vector. If 1, then it must have the same dimensions as columns in A, and the operation will be carried at each row vector.
The matrix where the result should be stored. Pass the same matrix as one of the arguments to perform the operation in place.

member.name: M:Accord.Math.Elementwise.Subtract(System.Decimal[][],System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Double[][])
member.summary: Subtracts a matrix A from a vectorb.
member.param: The dimension along which the means will be calculated. Pass 0 to compute a row vector containing the mean of each column, or 1 to compute a column vector containing the mean of each row. Default value is 0.
The matrix where the result should be stored. Pass the same matrix as one of the arguments to perform the operation in place.
